H0.text: Solid → gas → liquid is the sequence that lists the states of matter from least to greatest kinetic energy.

H1.text: Gas -> liquid -> solid is the sequence that lists the states of matter from least to greatest kinetic energy.

H2.text: Liquid → solid → gas is the sequence that lists the states of matter from least to greatest kinetic energy.

H3.text: Solid -> liquid -> gas is the sequence that lists the states of matter from least to greatest kinetic energy.

A4.text: solid transitions to liquid with an increase in temperature

A5.text: boils into a gas at its boiling point
